thread.title: Geary Falk
thread.title_full: Personal Comfort reviewed by Geary Falk

author: Geary Falk
title: Geary Falk
text: I bought a Tempur Pedic mattress 20 years ago and thought it was a wonderful mattress. But after 4 back surgeries it wasn't working for me anymore. I went online and ordered a new Lull mattress. It came with a 120 night free trial. After two months sleeping on this mattress, I decided it was not what I was looking for. I came across the Personal Comfort web site. I called the number on their site and spoke with a very knowledgeable sales person. I decided to take a chance with Personal Comfort mattress. Immediatly I had a great night of rest and sleep. And woke up pain free... This mattress is a winner and worth every penny I spent for it... I would recommend this mattress to anyone because it's completly adjustable from soft to firm...
